title: RWH structures shall be so sited as not to endanger the stability of building or earthwork
clause_text: RWH structures shall be so sited as not to endanger the stability of building or earthwork. The structures shall be designed such that no dampness is caused in any part of the walls or foundation of the building or those of an adjacent building.
